item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-03-22
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• RT: Sometimes doing the right thing is expensive. (via @Hunter) #
  • So before HCR, 32 million people would get sick, then the taxpayers would pay for it. After HCR taxpayers will pay for it. What's the issue? #
  • The HCR Breakdown: How the Health Care Overhaul Could Affect You - #
  • Listen to the world premiere of 'Between The Lines' by Stone Temple Pilots @STPBand #STPBetweenTheLines #

Powered by Twitter Tools
